alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Inland Collier County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Mainland Monroe (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 1:24PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Collier, northern Miami-Dade and southern Broward Counties through 200 PM EDT... At 124 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles south of Miccosukee Service Plaza to Fortymile Bend to 7 miles southeast of Shark Valley Obs Tower. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... The Redland, Shark Valley Obs Tower, Fortymile Bend and Big Cypress National Preserve. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Inland Broward County; Inland Collier County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Mainland Monroe
